text: In June, two white men became the first folks to finish the Appalachian Trail in 2020, lying to cops & trespassing on state & federal lands along the way. For @outsidemagazine, I interviewed them & wrote about the white privilege of hiking, especially now. https://t.co/1hPQc1LQjK
